verses.verse: Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> how my adversaries <S%H6862><s%> have increased! <S%H7231><s%> Many <S%H7227><s%> are those who rise up against me. <S%H6965><s%>
Many <S%H7227><s%> there are who say <S%H559><s%> of my soul, <S%H5315><s%> "There is no help <S%H3444><s%> for him in God. <S%H430><s%>" Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
But you, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, are a shield <S%H4043><s%> around me, <S%H3519><s%> my glory, and the one who lifts up <S%H7311><s%> my head. <S%H7218><s%>
I cry <S%H7121><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> with my voice, <S%H6963><s%> and he answers <S%H6030><s%> me out of his holy <S%H6944><s%> hill. <S%H2022><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
I laid myself down <S%H7901><s%> and slept. <S%H3462><s%> I awakened; <S%H6974><s%> for Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> sustains me. <S%H5564><s%>
I will not be afraid <S%H3372><s%> of tens of thousands <S%H7233><s%> of people <S%H5971><s%> who have set <S%H7896><s%> themselves against me on every side. <S%H5439><s%>

Arise, <S%H6965><s%> Yahweh! <S%H3068><s%> Save <S%H3467><s%> me, <S%H430><s%> my God! For you have struck <S%H5221><s%> all of my enemies <S%H341><s%> on the cheek bone. <S%H3895><s%> You have broken <S%H7665><s%> the teeth <S%H8127><s%> of the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>
Salvation <S%H3444><s%> belongs to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> Your blessing <S%H1293><s%> be on your people. <S%H5971><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
